infos.value: Lady Miranda, Wezette's forces seem to have fallen quite considerably in number.
Yes, you are right about that.
I suppose now is as good a time as any.
To be frank, I wasn't keen on participating in the diversion.
You, Lady Glaciela, and Lord Vadim are all putting your lives on the line.
I had hoped to be part of the entourage that stormed the castle gates.
You have had a change of heart?
Yes, ma'am. I see now that our time to shine is just beginning.
These battle tactics...they will surely bring us to victory.
Let us converge with Lady Glaciela's group at the castle gates.
